glsa.title: HDF5: Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in HDF5 which could lead to the arbitrary execution of code.

background.p: HDF5 technology suite includes a data model, library, and file format for storing and managing data.

description.p: Multiple arbitrary code execution vulnerabilities have been discovered in HDF5. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

impact.p: An attacker could execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the process via a maliciously crafted database file.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All HDF5 users should upgrade to the latest version:
